meanings.definition: A person who goes on dates.
meanings.sent1: The daters enjoyed a lovely dinner together.
meanings.sent2: There are many daters looking for love online.
meanings.sent3: The daters couldn't decide which movie to watch on their date.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of daters, she found her perfect match.
meanings.sent5: The daters' laughter filled the restaurant, creating a joyful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'dater', referring to multiple individuals who go on dates.
meanings.sent1: The group of daters planned a fun night out.
meanings.sent2: The daters in the park seemed to be having a great time.
meanings.sent3: The daters all showed up wearing matching outfits, causing a stir.
meanings.sent4: Among the daters, he stood out with his charming smile.
meanings.sent5: The daters' excitement was contagious as they prepared for their double date.
